last_episode_to_air.name: Father Michael
last_episode_to_air.overview: Father Michael makes a confession and Chloe wreaks a devastating revenge.

name: Broken
overview: Father Michael, a Catholic priest presiding over a Northern urban parish, who is modern, maverick, and reassuringly flawed, must be confidante, counselor and confessor to a congregation struggling to reconcile its beliefs with the challenges of daily life.

episodes.name: Christine
episodes.overview: Father Michael reaches out to a troubled parishioner, a single mother-of-three, who is badly struggling for money after a series of unfortunate events - but she rejects his attempts to help.

episodes.name: Helen
episodes.overview: Father Michael counsels a desperate gambler, and a devoted mother witnesses the fatal police shooting of her mentally ill son - a tragedy the priest thinks he could have prevented.

episodes.name: Andrew
episodes.overview: With the community in shock, Father Michael comforts PC Powell, who is being pressured to back up his colleagues' questionable version of events.

episodes.name: Roz
episodes.overview: Father Michael risks breaking the seal of confession as he tries to help Roz Demichelis, while his childhood flashbacks intensify as his mother's condition deteriorates.

episodes.name: Carl
episodes.overview: Father Michael has to mediate when Helen's devout brother, Daniel, clashes violently with her gay neighbour, Carl, as all try to come to terms with Vernon's death.

episodes.name: Father Michael
episodes.overview: Father Michael makes a confession and Chloe wreaks a devastating revenge.
